## blockRendering.RenderInfo.addInput\_() method

Add an input element to the active row, if needed, and record the type of the input on the row.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected addInput_(input: Input, activeRow: Row): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | [Input](./blockly.input_class.md) | The input to record information about. |
|  activeRow | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.row_class.md) | The row that is currently being populated. |

**Returns:**

void
